product_name: NEOM WellbeingOh Mg! Better Sleep Duo
summary: SummaryNEOM Wellbeing Oh Mg Better Sleep Duo, unwind after a busy day and create the ultimate dreamy night in with a skin-loving soak with Perfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Bath Milk and Body Butter.
details: DetailsBenefitsGive yourself a wellbeing boost whilst intensely nourishing & replenishing dry skinBeautiful milky texture to make tub time more luxurious than ever beforeA super relaxing blend of 100% natural lavender, chamomile and patchouli to help you unwind and switch off.Expertly blended with lavender, chamomile & patchouli for sleep prep thatâ€™s oh so dreamyA complex blend of up to 14 essential oils100% Natural Fragrances To Boost Your WellbeingKey Ingredients100% natural essential oilsMagnesiumMighty magnesium helps to remineralise, cleanse and enhance the natural hydration of skin. When infused within a warm bath, it also creates a calming and relaxing experience to help relieve tight, sore and tired muscles.IncludesPerfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Bath Milk (1.69 oz)Perfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Body Butter (1.1 oz)Item 2647830How To UseStep 1: Run a bath and pour in a capful of Perfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Bath Milk. Sink into this magnesium-powered, milky bath soak to help remineralise skin and soothe muscles and tired limbs. Soak for at least 10 minutes.Step 2: Apply the Perfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Body Butter all over and take a mindful moment to massage in and enjoy the sleepy scent.Body Butter: Caution: If the product enters the eye, wash out thoroughly with plenty of clean water.Bath Milk: Caution: Use only as directed. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.IngredientsBody Butter: Aqua (Water, Eau), Magnesium Chloride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Parfum (Fragrance)*, Pentylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Cetearyl Olivate, Linalool, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sorbitan Olivate, Glycerin, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Limonene, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citral.Bath Milk: Aqua (Water, Eau), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sucrose Stearate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sucrose Laurate, Linalool, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Magnesium Chloride, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Alcohol, Limonene, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Tocopherol, Geraniol, Citronellol, Citric Acid, Cellulose Gum.
how_to_use: Step 1: Run a bath and pour in a capful of Perfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Bath Milk. Sink into this magnesium-powered, milky bath soak to help remineralise skin and soothe muscles and tired limbs. Soak for at least 10 minutes.Step 2: Apply the Perfect Night's Sleep Magnesium Body Butter all over and take a mindful moment to massage in and enjoy the sleepy scent.Body Butter: Caution: If the product enters the eye, wash out thoroughly with plenty of clean water.Bath Milk: Caution: Use only as directed. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.
